sentences.english: In 2001 Shanhaiguan Pass district won the title of national historical and cultural town.
sentences.chinese: 2001年，山海關區又榮膺國家歷史文化名城稱號。

sentences.english: "Pass" of Shanhaiguan. This fort is near the eastern edges of the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 山海關的“通道”位於長城東部邊緣附近。

sentences.english: The Great Wall begins in the east from the Shanghaiguan Pass and ends at the Jiayuguan Pass in the west.
sentences.chinese: 長城東起山海關，西至嘉峪關。

sentences.english: We’ll be coming into Shanghaiguan in a few minutes.
sentences.chinese: 再過幾分鐘我們就要到山海關了。

sentences.english: The third part mainly is the elaboration of Shanhaiguan history and the development.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要是山海關歷史及其發展的論述。

sentences.english: The Great Wall east to Shanhaiguan, West to Gansu and east to Jiayuguan, the Yalu River.
sentences.chinese: 長城東起山海關，西至甘肅嘉峪關，東至鴨綠江。

sentences.english: Shanhaiguan three-dimensional traffic conditions are very favorable sea and air.
sentences.chinese: 山海關海陸空立體交通條件十分優越。

sentences.english: This is the second time the East Emperor Kangxi, when the customs officials who patrol the poem written.
